title: "Pompeiian Lady" plaque
marks:
Date, Inscription and Marks
Several illegible, li LLQ, engraved: [Elkington & Co. 1875]
description: concave, plate-like shape; relief design of seated woman wearing a gauzy drape in an interior; putti with flowers wearing a necklace on PL side of woman; another figure places a basket of flowers at woman\'s feet
creditline: Gift of various donors, by exchange
